New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 5 月 19 日星期日 18:12:34 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Napier-Taihape Rd: Cyclone survivor, mayor say road should become state highway https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-taihape-rd-cyclone-survivor-mayor-say-road-should-become-state-highway/P445CQIBRNGKTEKLVMOX7HQMHA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-taihape-rd-cyclone-survivor-mayor-say-road-should-become-state-highway/P445CQIBRNGKTEKLVMOX7HQMHA/ Gary Hamilton-Irvine'It’s confusing for people having the road under the jurisdiction of two councils.' Sun, 19 May 2024 18:00:00 +0000 Maureen Goodman and her partner George Luke were trapped on the Napier-Taihape Rd during Cyclone Gabrielle. Maureen managed to alert rescuers after walking out of the slip-ravaged road. Tragically George, who was trapped for three nights, died in hospital after being rescued. Photo / Connull Lang
Section of historical Napier to Gisborne railway line to be removed to keep road to Mahia open https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/section-of-historical-napier-to-gisborne-railway-line-to-be-removed-to-keep-road-to- mahia-开放/QRJQ5R64NJEDLGJVVSOCMOBULM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/section-of-historical-napier-to-gisborne-railway-line-to-be-removed-to-keep-road-to- mahia-开放/QRJQ5R64NJEDLGJVVSOCMOBULM/ Michaela GowerA railway line in northern Hawke's Bay is being removed to move the eroding road over. Sun, 19 May 2024 18:00:00 +0000 The railway line is being removed section by section. Photo / Paul Taylor
Motorist who witnessed car swerve off rural Auckland road claims he was verbally abused for calling police https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/motorist-who-witnessed-car-swerve-off-rural-auckland-road-claims-he-was-verbally-abused-for-calling-police/LMUBAMGM3JBNFKSV32CC7IRP6E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/motorist-who-witnessed-car-swerve-off-rural-auckland-road-claims-he-was-verbally-abused-for-calling-police/LMUBAMGM3JBNFKSV32CC7IRP6E/ Benjamin PlummerThe witness said the driver basically "flew into the ditch". Northland’s Aroha Island enters lease with former kaitiaki https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlands-aroha-island-enters-lease-with-former-kaitiaki/JSA4SQHMU5FSTIFLBXRZMHXBRQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlands-aroha-island-enters-lease-with-former-kaitiaki/JSA4SQHMU5FSTIFLBXRZMHXBRQ/ Brodie StoneNgā Kaitiaki o Motu Aroha Charitable Trust has been established to help the island thrive. Health advocate wants tougher penalties for New Zealand doctors who commit misconduct https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-advocate-wants-tougher-penalties-for-new-zealand-doctors-who-commit-misconduct/VKYZPRUOSFHSHEAJSNABHPR5B4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-advocate-wants-tougher-penalties-for-new-zealand-doctors-who-commit-misconduct/VKYZPRUOSFHSHEAJSNABHPR5B4/ Katie Harris"We’re short of doctors, but we shouldn’t accept doctors whose behaviour is that bad.” Sun, 19 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The Health Practitioners Disciplinary Tribunal declined to comment.
